name: Norwegian Butter Sauce (Sandefjordsmor)
author: Chef John
summary: This amazing and simple butter sauce is wonderful on all types of fish, but also works beautifully on shrimp and lobster.
ingredients: 5 tablespoons cold, unsalted butter, cut into cubes
directions: Place lemon juice in saucepan over medium heat; simmer until lemon juice reduces to less than a tablespoon and almost disappears, 4 or 5 minutes, being careful not to let it burn
Quickly add cream; whisk to combine
Continue to cook until cream reduces and is thick enough to coat the back of a spoon, 5 or 6 minutes
Whisk in 2 or 3 pieces of cold butter, stirring until butter melts before adding more
(If cream mixture cools too quickly, the sauce may break
) Continue adding butter a few pieces at a time until all butter is emulsified into the cream, 8 to 10 minutes
Add salt, cayenne pepper, and 2 generous tablespoons chopped parsley
Keep sauce warm until ready to use
